This page demonstrates all available shortcodes in the Hugo Narrow theme.
Hugo Built-in Shortcodes Hugo provides several built-in shortcodes . The content of these shortcodes is subject to change without notice, so you can visit the official page for detailed usage instructions.
The built-in shortcodes include:
Details Figure Gist Highlight Instagram Param QR Ref Relref Vimeo X YouTube Theme Custom Shortcodes Icon Display SVG icons from the theme’s icon library:
MARKDOWN Réduire 复制 {{< icon name="heart" >}} {{< icon name="github" size="lg" >}} {{< icon name="sun" class="text-primary" >}} Cliquez pour développer et voir plus Example: Parameters:
name: Icon name (required) - Check assets/icons/ for available icons or place custom icons in this directory, or place the custom icon in this directory size: xs, sm, md, lg, xl, 2xl (default: md) class: Custom CSS class, which can be used to change colors Button Create styled buttons with theme colors:
MARKDOWN Réduire 复制 {{< button text="Learn More" url="/about" >}} {{< button text="GitHub" url="https://github.com" icon="github" target="_self" >}} {{< button text="Download" url="/download" variant="outline" size="lg" >}} Cliquez pour développer et voir plus Example:
Primary Button Secondary Button Outline Button Small Size Medium Size Large Size With Icon External Link Parameters:
text: Button text (required, or use inner content) url: Link address (required) variant: primary, secondary, outline (default: primary) size: sm, md, lg (default: md) icon: Theme icon name target: _blank,_self (default: _blank) rel: Link relationship (noopener noreferrer is automatically added when _blank is used) Link Card Display a link card with a website icon:
MARKDOWN Réduire 复制 {{< link title="Google" description="The world largest search engine." url="https://google.com" icon="https://google.com/favicon.ico" >}} Cliquez pour développer et voir plus Examples: Google The world largest search engine.
google.com Bilibili Embed Bilibili videos:
MARKDOWN Réduire 复制 {{< bilibili BV号 >}} {{< bilibili AV号 分P号 >}} Cliquez pour développer et voir plus Tencent Video MARKDOWN Réduire 复制 {{< tencent 视频ID >}} Cliquez pour développer et voir plus Masonry Gallery Create a waterfall-style image gallery:
MARKDOWN Réduire 复制 {{< masonry >}} ![Image 1](/images/1.jpg) ![Image 2](/images/2.jpg) ![Image 3](/images/3.jpg) {{< /masonry >}} Cliquez pour développer et voir plus
